cards.name: Elesa
text: Search your deck for 3 Pokémon Tool cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Growth
attacks.text: Attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon.

ability.name: Royal Garden
ability.text: If this Pokémon has any Grass Energy attached to it, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Rest
attacks.text: Heal all damage from this Pokémon. This Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Hypnotic Gaze
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Tiptoe Step

attacks.name: Double Slap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

cards.name: Meloetta-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Brilliant Voice
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Round
attacks.text: Does 30 damage times the number of your Pokémon that have the Round attack.

attacks.name: Attract
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Honey Snack
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.
